actions.description: Passive: While the user is present on the Field, the Weather is set to Sunny and remains Sunny while the user is active on the Field. While affected by Sunny Weather, the user's base ATK increases by +33%. If the user gains @Affliction[fainted] or is switched out, the Sunny Weather set by the user lasts for 3 more rounds.
